title: What is really needed in the next 5 or 10 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: The first and foremost thing which humanity needs is -Sympathy.Now a days people have become robot and emotionless.If something bad happens with them then they expect to get others help but on the contrary very few people initiate help to others in need. Try to put yourself in others shoes,what if you were at their place?.Protest affirmably if something is wrong and detrimental to the society. Be a human first a kind helping human without selfness and expectations then automatically the world will become a family truly. All the best!!

Sustainability - To maintain the environment , ecology , wildlife , farmlands , waterbodies , fossil fuel consumption everything keeping in mind that future requirements and needs can be fulfilled , while not harming the mother earth.And especially human ethics plays important role in creating this kimd of though process. Hope this would be helpful for your question :)
